verses.verse: These are now the chief <WH7218> of their fathers <WH1>, and this is the genealogy <WH3187> <WH8692> of them that went up <WH5927> <WH8802> with me from Babylon <WH894>, in the reign <WH4438> of Artaxerxes <WH783> the king <WH4428>.
Of the sons <WH1121> of Pinchas <WH6372>; Gershom <WH1647>: of the sons <WH1121> of Ithamar <WH385>; Daniel <WH1840>: of the sons <WH1121> of David <WH1732>; Hattush <WH2407>.

Of the sons <WH1121> of Shechaniah <WH7935>, of the sons <WH1121> of Pharosh <WH6551>; Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148>: and with him were reckoned by genealogy <WH3187> <WH8692> of the males <WH2145> an hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>.
Of the sons <WH1121> of Pahathmoab <WH6355>; Elihoenai <WH454> the son <WH1121> of Zerahiah <WH2228>, and with him two hundred <WH3967> males <WH2145>.
Of the sons <WH1121> of Shechaniah <WH7935>; the son <WH1121> of YAHaziel <WH3166>, and with him three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> males <WH2145>.
Of the sons <WH1121> also of Adin <WH5720>; Ebed <WH5651> the son <WH1121> of Y'honatan <WH3129>, and with him fifty <WH2572> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Elam <WH5867>; Jeshaiah <WH3470> the son <WH1121> of Athaliah <WH6271>, and with him seventy <WH7657> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Shephatiah <WH8203>; Zebadiah <WH2069> the son <WH1121> of Mikha'el <WH4317>, and with him fourscore <WH8084> males <WH2145>.
Of the sons <WH1121> of Yo'av <WH3097>; `Ovadyah-yahu <WH5662> the son <WH1121> of Jehiel <WH3171>, and with him two hundred <WH3967> and eighteen <WH8083> <WH6240> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Shelomith <WH8019>; the son <WH1121> of Josiphiah <WH3131>, and with him an hundred <WH3967> and threescore <WH8346> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Bebai <WH893>; Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Bebai <WH893>, and with him twenty <WH6242> and eight <WH8083> males <WH2145>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Azgad <WH5803>; Johanan <WH3110> the son <WH1121> of Hakkatan <WH6997>, and with him an hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> males <WH2145>.
And of the last <WH314> sons <WH1121> of Adonikam <WH140>, whose names <WH8034> are these, Eliphelet <WH467>, Jeiel <WH3273>, and Shemaiah <WH8098>, and with them threescore <WH8346> males <WH2145>.
Of the sons <WH1121> also of Bigvai <WH902>; Uthai <WH5793>, and Zabbud <WH2072> <WH8675> <WH2139>, and with them seventy <WH7657> males <WH2145>.

And I gathered them together <WH6908> <WH8799> to the river <WH5104> that runneth <WH935> <WH8802> to Ahava <WH163>; and there abode we in tents <WH2583> <WH8799> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>: and I viewed <WH995> <WH8799> the people <WH5971>, and the Kohanim <WH3548>, and found <WH4672> <WH8804> there none of the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>.

Then sent <WH7971> <WH8799> I for Eliezer <WH461>, for Ariel <WH740>, for Shemaiah <WH8098>, and for Elnathan <WH494>, and for Jarib <WH3402>, and for Elnathan <WH494>, and for Natan <WH5416>, and for Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148>, and for Meshullam <WH4918>, chief men <WH7218>; also for Joiarib <WH3114>, and for Elnathan <WH494>, men of understanding <WH995> <WH8688>.

And I sent <WH6680> <WH8762> them with Mitzvah <WH3318> <WH8686> unto Iddo <WH112> the chief <WH7218> at the place <WH4725> Casiphia <WH3703>, and I told <WH7760> <WH8799> <WH6310> them what <WH1697> they should say <WH1696> <WH8763> unto Iddo <WH112>, and to his brethren <WH251> the Nethinims <WH5411> <WH8675> <WH5411>, at the place <WH4725> Casiphia <WH3703>, that they should bring <WH935> <WH8687> unto us ministers <WH8334> <WH8764> for the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430>.

And by the good <WH2896> hand <WH3027> of our 'Elohim <WH430> upon us they brought <WH935> <WH8686> us a man <WH376> of understanding <WH7922>, of the sons <WH1121> of Mahli <WH4249>, the son <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>, the son <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and Sherebiah <WH8274>, with his sons <WH1121> and his brethren <WH251>, eighteen <WH8083> <WH6240>;
And Hashabiah <WH2811>, and with him Jeshaiah <WH3470> of the sons <WH1121> of M'rari <WH4847>, his brethren <WH251> and their sons <WH1121>, twenty <WH6242>;

Also of the Nethinims <WH5411>, whom David <WH1732> and the princes <WH8269> had appointed <WH5414> <WH8804> for the service <WH5656> of the L'vi'im <WH3881>, two hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> Nethinims <WH5411>: all of them were expressed <WH5344> <WH8738> by name <WH8034>.

Then I proclaimed <WH7121> <WH8799> a fast <WH6685> there, at the river <WH5104> of Ahava <WH163>, that we might afflict <WH6031> <WH8692> ourselves before <WH6440> our 'Elohim <WH430>, to seek <WH1245> <WH8763> of him a right <WH3477> way <WH1870> for us, and for our little ones <WH2945>, and for all our substance <WH7399>.

For I was ashamed <WH954> <WH8804> to require <WH7592> <WH8800> of the king <WH4428> a band of soldiers <WH2428> and horsemen <WH6571> to help <WH5826> <WH8800> us against the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> in the way <WH1870>: because we had spoken <WH559> <WH8804> unto the king <WH4428>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The hand <WH3027> of our 'Elohim <WH430> is upon all them for good <WH2896> that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> him; but his power <WH5797> and his wrath <WH639> is against all them that forsake <WH5800> <WH8802> him.
So we fasted <WH6684> <WH8799> and besought <WH1245> <WH8762> our 'Elohim <WH430> for this: and he was intreated <WH6279> <WH8735> of us.
Then I separated <WH914> <WH8686> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> of the chief <WH8269> of the Kohanim <WH3548>, Sherebiah <WH8274>, Hashabiah <WH2811>, and ten <WH6235> of their brethren <WH251> with them,

And weighed <WH8254> <WH8799> unto them the silver <WH3701>, and the gold <WH2091>, and the vessels <WH3627>, even the offering <WH8641> of the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430>, which the king <WH4428>, and his counsellors <WH3289> <WH8802>, and his lords <WH8269>, and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> there present <WH4672> <WH8737>, had offered <WH7311> <WH8689>:

I even weighed <WH8254> <WH8799> unto their hand <WH3027> six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> talents <WH3603> of silver <WH3701>, and silver <WH3701> vessels <WH3627> an hundred <WH3967> talents <WH3603>, and of gold <WH2091> an hundred <WH3967> talents <WH3603>;

Also twenty <WH6242> basons <WH3713> of gold <WH2091>, of a thousand <WH505> drams <WH150>; and two <WH8147> vessels <WH3627> of fine <WH2896> <WH6668> <WH8716> copper <WH5178>, precious <WH2532> as gold <WH2091>.

And I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Ye are holy <WH6944> unto the YY <WH3068>; the vessels <WH3627> are holy <WH6944> also; and the silver <WH3701> and the gold <WH2091> are a freewill offering <WH5071> unto the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of your fathers <WH1>.

Watch <WH8245> <WH8798> ye, and keep <WH8104> <WH8798> them, until ye weigh <WH8254> <WH8799> them before <WH6440> the chief <WH8269> of the Kohanim <WH3548> and the L'vi'im <WH3881>, and chief <WH8269> of the fathers <WH1> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, at Yerushalayim <WH3389>, in the chambers <WH3957> of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.

So took <WH6901> <WH8765> the Kohanim <WH3548> and the L'vi'im <WH3881> the weight <WH4948> of the silver <WH3701>, and the gold <WH2091>, and the vessels <WH3627>, to bring <WH935> <WH8687> them to Yerushalayim <WH3389> unto the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430>.

Then we departed <WH5265> <WH8799> from the river <WH5104> of Ahava <WH163> on the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> day of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>, to go <WH3212> <WH8800> unto Yerushalayim <WH3389>: and the hand <WH3027> of our 'Elohim <WH430> was upon us, and he delivered <WH5337> <WH8686> us from the hand <WH3709> of the enemy <WH341> <WH8802>, and of such as lay in wait <WH693> <WH8802> by the way <WH1870>.
And we came <WH935> <WH8799> to Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and abode <WH3427> <WH8799> there three <WH7969> days <WH3117>.

Now on the fourth <WH7243> day <WH3117> was the silver <WH3701> and the gold <WH2091> and the vessels <WH3627> weighed <WH8254> <WH8738> in the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430> by the hand <WH3027> of Meremoth <WH4822> the son <WH1121> of Uriyah-yahu <WH223> the Kohen <WH3548>; and with him was Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Pinchas <WH6372>; and with them was Jozabad <WH3107> the son <WH1121> of Jeshua <WH3442>, and Noadiah <WH5129> the son <WH1121> of Binnui <WH1131>, L'vi'im <WH3881>;
By number <WH4557> and by weight <WH4948> of every one: and all the weight <WH4948> was written <WH3789> <WH8735> at that time <WH6256>.

Also the children <WH1121> of those that had been carried away <WH1473>, which were come out <WH935> <WH8802> of the captivity <WH7628>, offered <WH7126> <WH8689> burnt offerings <WH5930> unto the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> bullocks <WH6499> for all Yisra'EL <WH3478>, ninety <WH8673> and six <WH8337> rams <WH352>, seventy <WH7657> and seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532>, twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> he goats <WH6842> for a sin offering <WH2403>: all this was a burnt offering <WH5930> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And they delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> the king's <WH4428> commissions <WH1881> unto the king's <WH4428> lieutenants <WH323>, and to the governors <WH6346> on this side <WH5676> the river <WH5104>: and they furthered <WH5375> <WH8765> the people <WH5971>, and the house <WH1004> of 'Elohim <WH430>.
